App.Title: Swiss NIS Calculator
Home.Subtitle: NISV-compliant field strength calculations for amateur radio
Home.NewProject.Description: Create a new NIS calculation project
Home.About.Title: About NISV Compliance
Home.About.Text: This calculator helps Swiss amateur radio operators verify compliance with the Non-Ionizing Radiation Ordinance (NISV) by computing electric field strengths at sensitive locations.
Project.Name: Project Name
MasterData.Title: Master Data
MasterData.Subtitle: Manage antennas, cables, radios, and sensitive locations
MasterData.Antennas.Description: Manage antenna definitions with gain patterns
MasterData.Cables.Description: Define cable types with attenuation per frequency
MasterData.OKA.Description: Define locations requiring field strength compliance
Settings.Title: Settings
Settings.Theme.Description: Select light, dark, or system theme
Settings.About.Description: NISV-compliant field strength calculator for amateur radio operators in Switzerland.
